org.mfg.mdb.runtime

Class FilesTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mfg.mdb.runtime.FilesTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class FilesTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Class used to keep updated the "files.table" file of the session. This file contains a list of all the MDB files of the database and the table definition ID of the file.
    Author:
    arian
